Job Title: DevOps Engineer III

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About Cube Group, Inc.:Cube is a pioneering start-up that's reshaping the digital asset trading landscape. By merging the best features of both centralized and decentralized platforms, we're crafting a user-centric marketplace that champions transparency, security, and speed. As we address the challenges of traditional exchanges and DeFi, our vision is to be the preferred digital asset marketplace for a diverse range of clients.
Position OverviewYou'll work closely with our talented engineering team to develop and maintain Infrastructure as Code automation supporting the critical systems that power Cube. Your primary focus will be on building Ansible and Terraform automation for all the things. If you're an experienced DevOps engineer interested in tackling complex and multi-faceted problems and are eager to contribute to a revolutionary digital asset platform, we'd love to hear from you.
Key Responsibilities:Infrastructure as Code: Collaborate with our engineering team to design, develop, and optimize our infrastructure provisioning and application deployment automation with Ansible and TerraformMonitoring: Create and optimize dashboards, monitors, alerts, and monitoring integrations to enhance the visibility of our platform health and performance characteristicsSecurity and Reliability: Identify opportunities, propose, and implement automated solutions to enhance the reliability, resiliency, and security of our platformTechnical Leadership: Provide technical leadership within your domain, guiding and mentoring junior and mid-level engineers. Foster a culture of excellence, best practices, and continuous improvement.Code Review and Testing: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient Ansible and Terraform code. Participate in code reviews and testing to maintain code quality and identify areas for improvement.Collaborative Problem Solving: Work closely with cross-functional teams and external partners to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues, contributing to a culture of continuous improvement.Continuous Learning: Stay updated with the latest industry trends, best practices, and technologies to ensure our platform remains cutting-edge.

Qualifications:Experience: 8+ years of DevOps experience.
Technical Skills:Proficiency in creating custom Ansible roles from scratch, and working with complex inventory, variable structures, and Jinja2 templatingDeep expertise in creating custom Ansible roles from scratch, and working with complex inventory, variable structures, and Jinja2 templatingDeep expertise in creating custom Terraform modulesDeep expertise supporting Linux servers in large, high security, highly available environmentsDeep expertise with Linux security and performance optimization best practices and CIS security complianceProficiency in creating dashboards, monitors, and alerts with DataDog or similar monitoring platforms. Experience creating log ingest pipelines with multiple parsers.Experience supporting both bare-metal COLO and cloud based environmentsExperience with secrets management systems such as Hashicorp Vault, 1Password, and YubiKeyExperience with common system administration scripting languages such as bash and Python
Independent Contributor: Track record of driving complex projects and delivering high-quality solutions.Leadership Skills: A track record of technical leadership, guiding teams, and influencing technical decisions is a plusTrading and Blockchain Experience: While not mandatory, any experience or understanding of trading platforms and blockchain technology is a significant plus.Problem-solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Communication: Effective verbal and written communication skills.
Personal Attributes:Curious and eager to learn.Team player with a collaborative mindset.Detail-oriented and committed to quality.Adaptable and thrives in a fast-paced environment.Proactive and takes initiative.
What's in it for you?Opportunity to work on groundbreaking projects in the digital asset space.Collaborative and innovative work environment.Competitive salary and benefits.Growth and learning opportunities.
Next Steps:Initial Screening – 30 minutes.Technical design take-home - Varied.Take-home followup and chosen-topic presentation – 30 minutes.Final Interview – 1 hour.References and background check.
Cube Group, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer dedicated to fostering a diverse and inclusive workforce. We warmly welcome candidates from all backgrounds to apply.
Salary Range: The expected salary range for this position is competitive and commensurate with experience.
Join us and be a part of the future of digital asset trading!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
